label: Holdover recalculation drill
description: Escalation scenario where holdover time is expiring during a snow burst.

steps.text: Iceman, Polar 611 heavy, snow intensifying. Confirm holdover tolerance.
Quote holdover expiration and request recalculation.
expected: Polar 611 heavy, current holdover expires zero five one eight zulu, request recalculation for moderate snow

steps.text: Authorize additional spray and request inspection interval.
Confirm spray, inspection, and taxi clearance hold.
expected: Additional Type IV spray authorized, inspection in three minutes, hold position until released
